rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a reception area aligned to the front entrance. Decorative Art Deco motifs are integrated into the paneling.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space featuring Art Deco furniture and decorative accents, ideal for a bachelor pad vibe. Features a combined dining area with built-in storage.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space designed for productivity with efficient storage and a view towards the garden, keeping work-life balance in mind. Minimalist Art Deco finishes enhance focus.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with ample natural light and an ensuite bathroom, decorated with Art Deco fixtures. It is positioned for optimal privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Master En-suite)
rooms.description: An en-suite bathroom integrated into the master bedroom, designed with elegant finishes and efficient use of space.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated area for domestic help; compact yet functional living space following Art Deco design cues, ensuring privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: A dedicated outdoor swimming pool area with a deck and seating, designed to adhere to local norms. The pool is positioned on the south side for sun exposure.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Service room featuring kitchenette, storage, and utility services, maintaining a budget-friendly design.

openings.description: Main entrance door with Art Deco detailing.
Large windows to enhance natural lighting, aligned per Vastu.
Private door for master bedroom with secure locks.
Windows providing ample daylight and enhancing productivity.
Separate access for domestic help ensuring privacy.
